verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Sing unto God Sing praises to His name Sing unto God Sing praises to His name. Extol Him who rides upon The heavens by His name Extol Him who rides upon The heavens by his name Extol Him who rides upon The heavens by His name. By His name, I Am.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}And rejoice before Him And rejoice before Him And rejoice, rejoice before Him. And rejoice before Him And rejoice before Him And rejoice, rejoice before Him.{/lang-eng}
